data_table.description: Cohort Event Eligibility Form (HF Community Surveillance). Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CELB05
variable.description: [Identification information]. Source used to identify event. Q5 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB06
variable.description: [Identification information]. Is this a death? Q6 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11A
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 402, 410-414, 427, 428, or 518.4 code listed? Q11a [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11B
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 430-436 code listed? Q11b [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11C
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 35-9,88.5,250,390-459,745-7,794.3, 798, or 799 code listed Q11c (deleted in version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB12
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is this event an in-hospital death? Q12 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB14B
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Is the code E10-E14, I10, I11, I20-I25, I46-I51, I70, I97 (exclude I97.2), J81, J96, R96, R98, or R99? Q14b [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB15
variable.description: [Form to abstract]. Event eligible. Q15 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB16
variable.description: Event not eligible. Q16 (deleted on version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB17
variable.description: Event is death and not eligible. Q17 (deleted on version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB19A
variable.description: [Form to abstract]. Was this event reported in the corresponding annual follow-up for this participant? Q19a [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB19B
variable.description: [Form to abstract]. Contact year of corresponding annual follow-up. Q19b [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELBFLAG
variable.description: =1 If CELB1 (or later version) is present [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11A1
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 00.50 - 00.54, 00.61-00.66, 35-39, 88.5, 89.49, 99.10 250, 390-459, 745-747, 794.3, 798, or 799 code listed? Q11a1 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11A2
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Are any of the following mentioned or suggested in the discharge summary? Q11a2 Acute: MI, Angina, Chest Pain, Ischemic Heart Disease, CHD, Unstable Angina, Cardiac Arrest, Atherosclerotic Heart Disease. Or during this admission: CCU Care, Nitroglycerin, Cardiac Catheterization, CABG, Elevated CK MB, Coronary Angiography or Angioplasty, Thrombolytic therapy for coronary occlusion [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11B1
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 00.50 - 00.54, 00.61-00.66, 35-39, 88.5, 89.49, 99.10 250, 390-459, 745-747, 794.3, 798, or 799 code listed? Q11b1 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11B2
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Are any of the following mentioned or suggested in the discharge summary? Q11b2 Acute: Stroke, TIA, Cerebral infarction, Cerebrovascular disease, Aphasia, Diplopia, Cerebral embolus, Lacunar (syndrome infarction), Dysarthria, Paralysis, Cerebral hemorrhage, Subarachnoid hemorrhage. Or during this admission: Carotid endarterectomy, Cerebral angiography, CT/MRI scan showing cerebrovascular findings, Carotid stent placement, Neuro ICU care, Thrombolytic therapy for cerebral occlusion [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11F
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 398.91, 402.01, 402.11, 402.91, 404.01, 404.03, 404.11, 404.13, 404.91, 404.93, 415.0, 416.9, 425.4, 428, 518.4, 786.0 code listed? Q11f [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11F1
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Is a 00.50 - 00.54, 00.61 -00.66, 35-39, 88.5, 89.49, 99.10, 250, 390-459, 745-747, 794.3, 798, or 799 code listed? Q11f1 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB11F2
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index of fact sheet]. Are any of the following mentioned or suggested in the discharge summary? Q11f2 Acute: HF, Cardiomyopathy, Orthopnea, CHF, Ventricular Failure, Paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, Pump Failure, Impaired systolic function, Cardiomegaly, JVD, LVD, Pulmonary Edema. Or during this admission: Heart Biopsy, Automatic Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator (AICD) check, Implantation of cardiac resynchronization pacemaker (CRT) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: CELB18
variable.description: Event on surv discharge or dth lists? Q18 (deleted on version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form, CELB]

variable.name: FORMVER
variable.description: Form version
